title: I am a Full Stack developer
text1: I am a passionate Full Stack developer with a strong interest in technology, characterized by curiosity and a solution-oriented mindset. I am organized and consistent, which makes me efficient and punctual. I highly value communication and commitment in teamwork.
text2: Furthermore, my experience in karate has instilled discipline and tenacity in me, particularly in high-pressure situations. I am seeking opportunities within a dynamic company to contribute and continue learning in my career as a developer.
experience1.1: Support in technical design by analyzing the technical requirements of the application.
experience1.2: Assist in the integration of technical components and applications to meet business requirements.
experience1.3: Conduct unit tests and participate in integration testing.
experience1.4: Maintain, adjust, and repair applications to ensure their performance aligns with technical and functional specifications.
experience1.5: Document and provide training and user support.
experience2.1: Full Stack Developer in an e-commerce hackathon, enhancing UX, search, and security.
experience2.2: Designed functionalities, scalability, database architecture, and RESTful API.
interests0: Outside of my work as a Full Stack developer, I have a wide range of interests that keep me motivated and well-rounded. Here are a few things I'm passionate about:
interests1: Technology and Innovation: I'm always exploring the latest trends and innovations in the tech world. Whether it's artificial intelligence, blockchain, or the latest gadgets, I'm eager to learn and stay updated.
interests2: Teamwork and Collaboration: Collaboration is a key aspect of my work, and I apply the principles I've learned in karate to build strong, communicative teams. I believe that great teamwork is the foundation of success.
interests3: Continuous Learning: I'm a strong believer in lifelong learning. Whether it's picking up a new programming language or diving into a non-tech-related subject, I'm always seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.
interests4: Feel free to reach out if you share any of these interests or if you'd like to connect and discuss potential collaborations or opportunities. I'm excited to engage with like-minded individuals and organizations.
careerGoals: While I won't delve into specific projects in this tab, I'd like to share a bit about my career goals and focus as a Full Stack developer.

careerGoal1.title: Continuous Learning
careerGoal1.description: My primary goal is to keep learning and growing in the world of technology. I'm committed to the constant improvement of my skills and knowledge in web development and related areas.

careerGoal2.title: Collaboration
careerGoal2.description: Valuing collaboration and teamwork, I seek opportunities to work with individuals who are passionate about technology and innovation. I believe that together we can achieve remarkable things.

careerGoal3.title: Innovation
careerGoal3.description: I'm passionate about technological innovation and aspire to be part of projects and teams at the forefront of creating innovative solutions for current challenges.

careerContact: If you share these interests or have collaboration opportunities that align with my goals, I'd be delighted to have a conversation with you.
card1.1: I specialize in Frontend Development, creating user-friendly and responsive web interfaces to enhance the user experience.
card2.1: I excel in Backend Development, building robust server-side applications to handle data and logic efficiently.
card3.1: My expertise includes Cybersecurity, safeguarding digital systems and data from potential threats and vulnerabilities.
keyDesignAndUIToolsAndFrameworks: Design and UI Tools and Frameworks
